transcript: in society, however, is capital which has to be economized if it is to last. Prince Vasfli knew this, and having once realized that if he asked on behalf of all who begged of him, he would soon be unable to ask for himself, he became chary of using his influ- ence. But in Princess Drubetskdya's case he felt, after her second appeal, something like qualms of conscience. She had reminded him of what was quite true; he had been indebted to her father for the first steps in his career. More- ov
